definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-

sentences.english: This link represents the network access that the server provides to the virtual system.
sentences.chinese: 該鏈接代表了服務器提供給虛擬機系統的網絡訪問。

sentences.english: Create and copy virtual machine images to multiple workstations.
sentences.chinese: 創建並複製虛擬機映像到多個工作站。

sentences.english: Duties for network and security controls of virtual machines may not be well separated.
sentences.chinese: 對虛擬機的網絡和安全控制職責可能沒有很好地分隔。

sentences.english: Virtual machines can also provide sandboxing and isolation to limit attacks.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬機也同樣可以提供沙盒和隔離來限制可能的攻擊。

sentences.english: During the capture, the updated virtual machine disks are transferred back to the appliance.
sentences.chinese: 在捕捉期間，更新後的虛擬機磁盤將被傳遞迴設備。

sentences.english: You also need to provide passwords that will be used to login to the virtual machine.
sentences.chinese: 您還需要提供用於登錄虛擬機的密碼。

sentences.english: Cannot creat diretctory on virtual machine. Aborting the drag and drop operation.
sentences.chinese: 從虛擬機往物理機拖動拷貝還沒有發現有這個問題。

sentences.english: Through these operations, the user can manage and monitor the virtual machine.
sentences.chinese: 通過這些操作，用戶可以管理和監視虛擬機。

sentences.english: A snapshot saves the state of your virtual machine at a specific point in time.
sentences.chinese: 快照保存特定時間點時虛擬機的狀態。

sentences.english: The shear number of virtual servers that gets installed makes administrating almost as painful as real servers.
sentences.chinese: 管理多個虛擬機幾乎跟管理真實的服務器一樣痛苦。

sentences.english: Gerrit noted that there are a few problems with virtual machines.
sentences.chinese: Gerrit注意到採用虛擬機存在幾個問題。

sentences.english: Each individual VM has plain userspace threads.
sentences.chinese: 每一個獨立的虛擬機是一個普通用戶空間線程。

sentences.english: These levels constitute a hierarchy of virtual machines.
sentences.chinese: 這些層構成了一個虛擬機的等級層次。

sentences.english: Target directory for storing the virtual machine image files.
sentences.chinese: 用於存儲虛擬機映像文件的目標目錄。

sentences.english: Now that you have finished creating your virtual machine, it's time to install an operating system.
sentences.chinese: 既然已經創建了虛擬機，就該安裝操作系統了。

sentences.english: That displays any virtual machine instances you have.
sentences.chinese: 這顯示您擁有的任何虛擬機實例。

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
(of a mobile app) to crash on startup/to crash
